answers.answer: Its possible.  I'm 5'5" black and pretty pregnancy weight was 117. That's skinny for a black girl .   Now last time I went to the Dr I weighed 153 and by looking at me u wouldn't think I gained that much . I'm not complaining tho I love the thickness lol
Lol my pre pregnancy weight was 110 lbs, I know what you mean. I just could not believe i gained 6 lbs within a matter of days, Idk if my baby is going through a growth spur or what
Probably so . BTW I'm 36 weeks also . due date 2/28
If your having any swelling it could be from water weight too
I really don't drink alot of water, even though I should. ..i go to the doctor tomorrow, so i will know for sure if my baby was going through a growth spur
How is your blood pressure? Weight gain like that is a huge sign for preeclampsia

I'm 36 weeks tomorrow and have out on at least 50 lbs. I worked out a lot in the early days but ominous so much pain Now I can barely do stairs. I feel awful and huge even though my man tells me I look great and most people tell me I look good for this far along. I can tell I'll be stuck in comfy clothes for the first few weeks. But then it's back to the gym and I know it'll be so worth it to be the hot mom my hubby deserves
My blood pressure is fine, I've never had any problems with it. Everytime I go to the doctor it gets checked
Yeah its possible. I gained 4lbs in a week. Whoops...
You should be gaining a pound a week, so its not unlikely. Take it as a good thing that your baby is growing and healthy :)

question: I'm currently 36 weeks, but beginning-mid last week, I was weighing in at about 144 lbs. All of a sudden I started experiencing extreme hunger lol, it was like I would eat, but wouldn't get full. I weighed myself Saturday night, and I weighed 150 lbs. I had gained 6 lbs within a few days!?
title: WEIGHT GAIN??
